title: Blended Language Learning Design Utilizing Digital Educational Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Fundamental Language Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining VR/simulation-based activities with in-person classes in BYOD environments; emphasizes digital content creation and collaborative projects tailored to language domains

learning_goals: Learners produce and present three or more language projects using digital tools (blogs, webquests, etc.) in blended learning environments.
Cultivating the ability to design learning objectives-assessment-activity linkages according to backward design principles
Passing evaluations of target language cultural experiences and situational conversation tasks in a VR simulation environment
Improving language projects at least twice based on peer feedback and formative assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
